title: Hello recently i moved to germany and i wanna know if i can use LoL Skin Preview
body: Hello recently i moved to germany and i wanna know if i can use LoL Skin Preview without getting that tax of 800 euros. Yeah ik i have a very abd english

replies.body:
I can't greenlight a specific program, as Riot doesn't develop this application, nor does Riot screen these applications for use. You can find our official stance on these sorts of applications in [**this article**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
